name: Large Project Benchmark
description: Tests alignment computation for a large project (100+ goals, complex dependencies)
intent: Build a comprehensive enterprise SaaS platform with multi-tenant architecture, authentication, authorization, RBAC, audit logging, real-time notifications, webhooks, API gateway, microservices, database sharding, caching, message queue, background jobs, monitoring, alerting, CI/CD integration, testing framework, documentation site, admin portal, customer dashboard, mobile apps, and integrations
